onboard.welcome_to_vecta:
Welcome to Vecta!

Let's get started with your first drawing
here.
onboard.prompt_restore_drawing:
Do you know that you can restore your
drawings even after moving them into
trash?
onboard.prompt_restore_team:
Do you know that you can restore your
team from trash even after leaving it?
onboard.prompt_create_drawing:
Welcome back!

What drawing will you create today?
onboard.prompt_create_team:
Start creating a team and invite friends to
share drawings easily and collaborate in
real-time.

Simply click on the '+' sign to create your
first team.
onboard.team_start: Let's get started by creating your first team
onboard.team_guide: Drawings created in teams will be automatically shared among members, it's the easiest way to ensure your team get really productive.
onboard.invite_para: Get your team running quickly by inviting your coworkers
onboard.end_list: You have reached the end of the list.

tips.operations.icon:
Group, ungroup, flip
or join selected shapes
tips.set_public.label: Anyone on the internet can find and access
tips.shared_url.icon: Get a shareable link without sending emails
tips.custom_gradient.icon: Drag and drop to the left to save
tips.edit_info.icon:
A confirmation link will
be sent to your previous email.
tips.fit_to_drawing.tip: Increase the width and height to add the margin

login.name: Name
login.not_matched: Password does not match. Please try again
login.go_signup: Don't have an account? Sign up now
login.go_signin: Already have an account? Sign in now
login.network_failed: Are you connected to the Internet? Please check your connection and try again.
login.user_disabled: Your account has been disabled. If you think this is a mistake, please contact support@vecta.io.
login.storage_disabled:
Your browser does not support web storage, or it has been disabled.
Please enable web storage in your browser or try again with a different browser.
login.firebase_error: If you are seeing this, please contact support@vecta.io with a screenshot of the error above.
login.wrong_credentials:
You have previously logged in using your email and password.
Please log in with the email and password instead.
login.short_pwd: Your password must be at least 8 characters
login.email_taken: There is already an account with this email address

signup.signout: No thanks. Get me out of here
signup.ask_create_account:
It seems that you've signed in, but we're unable to find any records of you registering with us.

Please click on the button below to start saving and sharing your drawings immediately!
signup.dont_go: We hate to see you go, but we totally understand, please come back anytime.

verify.unverified_not_found: We are unable to verify your link. You may have already been registered with us. Please try to login again. If you are unable to log in, please contact us at hello@vecta.io.
verify.send_confirmation: A confirmation email has been sent to
verify.activate_account: Click on the confirmation link in the email to activate your account.
verify.successful_mssg: You may now sign in to Vecta and start drawing. Don’t forget to invite your team and start collaborating.
verify.failed_mssg: We are sorry but it seems your verification link has expired. Please sign in to resend verification email.

reset.send_reset: A reset link has been sent to
reset.reset_sent: Click on the link in the email to reset your password
reset.successful_mssg: Your password has been successfully updated.
reset.error_mssg: Password update failed. The reset link might have expired.

noti.same_day: Note: Announcement will start on the very same day it was created.
noti.permission_given:
Push notifications are now enabled.
Welcome aboard Vecta!
noti.blocked:
Oops, looks like you have disabled push notification on your browser.
We'll remember your decision and send push notifications your way once you have enabled it back.
noti.request_permission:
Hello @@,

Get notified by Vecta when your teammates make a change in your team or drawing.

Would you like to enable push notifications?
noti.denied_permission: Okay, we will remember your decision and not send push notifications to you.
noti.no_noti: It's a little quiet, no? Notifications will be buzzing in a bit.
noti.kicked: Your access has been removed from @@
noti.access_changed: Your access has been changed from @@ to @@
noti.invited: You are invited to join @@. Click to accept the invitation.
noti.shared: @@ is shared to you. Click to add this drawing to your dashboard.
noti.request_accepted: Your request to access @@ has been granted. Click to add this drawing to your dashboard.
noti.requesting: @@ requests to access @@. Click to approve this request.

publish.done: Drawing successfully published to the web.

slack.ben1: -Share Vecta drawing directly to your Slack channels
slack.ben2: -Invite Slack channel members into Vecta teams
slack.team_guide: Slack integration allows you to share Vecta drawing directly to your Slack Channels and invite your Slack channel members into Vecta teams.

page.page_changed: Page size has changed. Please refresh your drawing.

preload.shortcuts: Draw faster with these keyboard shortcuts
preload.import: Simply drag and drop to import images
preload.duplicate: Duplicate shapes by CTRL + Drag + Drop
preload.create-team: Create teams to easily share drawings
preload.invite-members: Invite members to get your team up and running in Vecta
preload.shape-properties: Modify shapes using expressions for high accuracy
preload.metrics: Right click on rulers to set your own measurement units
preload.layers: Use layers to hide or show relevant information
preload.version-history: Use version history to keep track of changes in your drawing
preload.scaling: Specify your drawing’s scale to model real world measurements
preload.find-replace: Easily search for text with Ctrl + F
preload.guide: Use guides to align and arrange shapes on your drawings
preload.shape-link: Add hyperlinks into shapes for quick access to websites
preload.search: Search for drawings, folders or teams with ease
preload.share-drawing: Use links to share drawings on social media
preload.save-symbols: Drag and drop to your custom stencil to reuse symbols
preload.publishing: Publish and share your drawing to the world
preload.chat: Chat with your teammates right away in Vecta's editor
preload.gradient: Use linear or radial gradient to make your drawing lively
preload.slack: Integrate Vecta with Slack for better collaboration
preload.symbol-search: Search for symbols in Vecta's growing symbols library

settings.receive_noti: Notify me when a team member:

general.sym_resize: Automatically resize symbols to snap on grid

noti.created: Created a new drawing, folder or stencil
noti.renamed: Renamed a drawing, folder or stencil
noti.trashed: Trashed a drawing, folder or stencil

tp2ryqLTz1M.title: How to Resize Shapes Proportionally and Use Offset
tp2ryqLTz1M.desc: Use SHIFT key to fix proportions and ALT key to use offset.

Zap6sT5bOB0.title: Apply last used color directly onto other shapes, texts, and lines easily
Zap6sT5bOB0.desc: Make full use of your color painter to apply last used color onto your shapes, texts, and lines.

AOeIJRAECEk.title: Create Team and Invite Team Members
AOeIJRAECEk.desc: Invite your friends and teammates to collaborate effectively.

Y-lxlpDM-7g.title: How to Add or Edit Text Box in Shapes
Y-lxlpDM-7g.desc: Use Ctrl-5 to easily add text box, resize or rotate your text box in text mode.

wZUVOSDEpPo.title: How to Use Symbols and Stencils
wZUVOSDEpPo.desc: Watch this video on how to save symbols into your own stencils. Save more time by just drag and drop repetitive symbols onto drawing.

RX3vce2QXyk.title: How to Connect Shapes Accurately
RX3vce2QXyk.desc: What's the difference between connectors and lines?

JBvyeA743Qo.title: What are Layers and How to Use Them
JBvyeA743Qo.desc: Use layers to better categorize your shapes for easier editing, or hide information.

1XbHln-9QDg.title: How to Organize Drawings and Folders in Dashboard
1XbHln-9QDg.desc: Move your drawings easily by dragging and dropping to any teams or folders. Use the search bar to find your drawings easily!

EWtTCLx8ngg.title: Anatomy of Vecta Color Palette
EWtTCLx8ngg.desc: Watch this guide to know how to access last used color and customize color using RGB values or HEX codes.

nlAyOo-_HLQ.title: Quick intro to Fragment, Union, Difference, Intersect
nlAyOo-_HLQ.desc: Create your own symbols with fragment, union, difference and intersect operation.
